alert.note: Alert for Calumet; Manitowoc; Waushara; Winnebago (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 2:40PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Light to occasionally moderate snow will impact the late afternoon and early evening commute. Expect slippery roads... Bands of light to occasionally moderate snow will continue to impact parts of Eastcentral Wisconsin roughly southeast of a line from Wisconsin Rapids, to Clintonville to Oconto. The heaviest snowfall over the next couple of hours will be over the Fox Valley Valley area from Green Bay southward. Up to 4 inches will be possible by early evening primarily over parts of Manitowoc County with visibilities occasionally falling 1/2 mile at times. Lesser amounts can be expected as you head north. Roads will be slippery so please travel with caution, slow down and leave plenty of space between you and other vehicles. The snow will persist into the early evening and will impact the evening commute.
